name: National Energy Technology Laboratory (NETL). 2010. Longwall mining system; Equipment assembly; Production mix, at underground coal mine
description:
BRIEF DESCRIPTION
This unit process calculates the number of each piece of equipment included in a longwall mining system needed to mine coal at an underground, Illinois No.6 bituminous coal mine. Equipment includes shearer, shields, head and tail drives, stage loader, and line pans.
